title: Sheraton Downtown Austin Stay near Texas State Capitol with Daily Breakfast
description: Experience the vibrant heart of Texas' thriving capital at The Sheraton Austin Hotel at the Capitol, where classic charm and newly renovated contemporary design converge to provide top-tier relaxation. Enjoy a crisp beer or a creative cocktail at The Yard or relax by the hotel's glittering pool, flanked by sun loungers. Explore the city's thriving music and cultural scene and make the most of your central location near the Texas State Capitol and the University of Texas. Immerse yourself in Austin's renowned foodie culture or explore the city's rich history at the nearby Bullock Texas State History Museum.
location_description: Sheraton Austin Hotel at the Capitol
offer_address: 701 E 11th Street, Austin, Texas 78701, United States

title: Boutique Austin Escape near Rainey Street with Rooftop Pool, Daily Dining Credit & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Soak up Austin’s effortlessly cool vibe with a stay at the utterly stylish Hotel Van Zandt - a boutique haven where captivating Southern charm meets laidback luxury. Perfectly positioned in the heart of the buzzing Rainey Street District, this downtown escape places you just steps from bungalow-style bars, iconic food trucks and legendary live music venues that will have you captivated from the moment you step out.

Make the most of the hotel's enviable address with a front-row seat to the city’s world-famous music scene and annual festivals. Return to savour modern Texan cuisine and smooth jazz at the onsite Geraldine's restaurant, enjoy live tunes and craft cocktails at the poolside bar, or head straight to the trendy rooftop to soak up the city’s electric energy from above.
offer_address: 605 Davis Street, Austin, Texas 78701, United States

title: Modern Downtown Austin Mid-Century Stay with Restaurant, Bar & Coffee Shop
description: Enjoy being steps from Austin's lively 6th Street Entertainment District with a relaxing stay at this refreshed retreat in the heart of the city's Downtown. Before you set out for the day, grab a quick coffee and buttery pastry at President's House Coffee. Between Texan adventures, take a dip in the hotel's sparkling rooftop pool, sip margaritas while overlooking the skyline at Cloud Bar, or sit down to enjoy casual eats at Capital A.
offer_address: 700 San Jacinto at 8th Street, Austin, Texas 78701, United States

title: Dallas Art Hotel with Miami Resort-Style Swimming Pool
description:
Escape the ordinary and enter an art-filled paradise at Lorenzo Hotel, a downtown haven that comes top-rated on Tripadvisor. Here, an eclectic style inspired by Andy Warhol meets Alice in Wonderland to create a whimsical setting: art dances through the corridors, and rooms feature a curated selection of local and international works, while timeless literature is on display in the lobby.

The hotel also features a Miami resort-style swimming pool flanked by sun loungers and private cabanas, with Relativity Bar serving up refreshing poolside summer cocktails and light snacks. When hunger strikes, the bright and buzzing Taco Enzo, a funky taqueria, dishes out high-quality street tacos, quesadillas and burrito bowls. Meanwhile, Hamilton's Restaurant & Cocktail Lounge is your go-to for classic cocktails, retro vibes and jazz. Admire views of the Dallas skyline from the pool, while the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Centre is just a six-minute walk away.
offer_address: 1011 S Akard St, Dallas, TX 75215, United States
